translations.aboutCoronaP1: Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.
translations.aboutCoronaP2: Most people infected with the COVID-19 virus will experience mild to moderate respiratory illness and recover without requiring special treatment. Older people, and those with underlying medical problems like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer are more likely to develop serious illness.
translations.aboutCoronaP3: The best way to prevent and slow down transmission is be well informed about the COVID-19 virus, the disease it causes and how it spreads. Protect yourself and others from infection by washing your hands or using an alcohol based rub frequently and not touching your face.
translations.aboutCoronaP4: The COVID-19 virus spreads primarily through droplets of saliva or discharge from the nose when an infected person coughs or sneezes, so itâ€™s important that you also practice respiratory etiquette (for example, by coughing into a flexed elbow).
translations.aboutCoronaP5: At this time, there are no specific vaccines or treatments for COVID-19. However, there are many ongoing clinical trials evaluating potential treatments. WHO will continue to provide updated information as soon as clinical findings become available.
translations.coronaSymptomsP1: The COVID-19 virus affects different people in different ways. COVID-19 is a respiratory disease and most infected people will develop mild to moderate symptoms and recover without requiring special treatment. People who have underlying medical conditions and those over 60 years old have a higher risk of developing severe disease and death.
translations.coronaSymptomsP4: People with mild symptoms who are otherwise healthy should self-isolate and contact their medical provider or a COVID-19 information line for advice on testing and referral.
translations.coronaSymptomsP5: People with fever, cough or difficulty breathing should call their doctor and seek medical attention.
translations.coronaPreventionP1: To prevent infection and to slow transmission of COVID-19, do the following:
translations.donateP0: Contribute your part. Help the people in need. Your single contribution will play a major role in saving the life of people who are mostly affected by this pandemic. Donate for a Good Cause.
translations.donateP1: You can donate money using various payment methods available below.
translations.donateP2: Note: The payment details provided here in this page are authentic and is verified government's official account details.
translations.donateP3: Choose any from below payment methods to pay:
translations.donateList1P1: Pay using any UPI App like Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, BHIM UPI etc. Click the below button and choose your preferred app to pay.
